channel.title: HTML on Chris Engstrom
channel.description: Recent content in HTML on Chris Engstrom

item.title: HTML/CSS Horizontal Menu
item.description: /* HTML/CSS Horizontal Menu Post */ .horizontal-menu { list-style: none; margin: 20px 20px 70px !important; padding: 0; width: 525px } .horizontal-menu li { display: inline; position: relative; } .horizontal-menu li a { text-decoration: none; padding: 5px 0; width: 100px; background: #32522b; color: #eee; float: left; color: #8292A0; font-weight: bold; text-align: center; border-left: 1px solid #121212; } .horizontal-menu li a:hover { background: #92C088; color: #252B30 } .first_menu_item { border: none !
